name: Skin Shift
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
A target creature has its skin deadened, dealing 3 poison damage per hit die of the creature which can't be reduced. In exchange, the dead skin acts as almost impenetrable armor, granting 3 damage reduction per hit die of the creature for the duration. Unwilling creatures can make a Constitution saving throw to avoid the effect on a success.

This spell has no effect on creatures without a skin or creatures immune to poison damage.
